Basic functions in mcu¶

Compute bandgap and Fermi level:

1
2
3
4
import mcu
mymcu = mcu.VASP()    # Define an mcu object
mymcu.get_bandgap()   # Get the bandgap
mymcu.efermi          # Get Fermi level
